EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the Wave!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Our clean energy future starts with you.
Thanks for choosing BlueWave as your community solar provider and supporting clean, affordable solar energy within your community.
We're on a mission to revolutionize energy with simple, powerful solar solutions - and that revolution starts with you. Thank you for being here.
Now for some more information regarding what your utility bill and new BlueWave bill will look like:
You will now see an "adjustments" line item on your utility bill
And you will start receiving a BlueWave bill for your energy usage, minus your Community Solar savings
Have Questions? We have a Customer Care Team dedicated to helping ensure you have a smooth, seamless experience. Send them an email at BlueWave Customer Care or give them a call at 844.786.4100.
Customer Care
Thanks for joining the wave, we're happy you're here.
- All of us here at BlueWave
